assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nippon Sharyo, Ltd. engages in the manufactures and sale of railway rolling stock, transportation equipment, steel structures, and construction equipment; and engineering and other activities in Japan, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company offers EMUs, DMUs, passenger cars, linear motor cars, track maintenance machines, and rolling stock components; and bullet, inter-city and express, and suburban and commuter trains; and metro and subway vehicles, automated guideway transit systems, light rail transit vehicles, and monorails, as well as exports high speed trains. It also provides tank trucks and trailers, containers, storage tanks, heavy duty carriers, automated guided vehicles, freight cars, roadway bridges, and railway bridges; pile driving rigs, casing rotators, earth drilling rig, obstacle removal equipment, crawler cranes, and other products related to foundation work; and soil stabilizing and mini piling rings, and generators. In addition, the company offers facility and plat engineering services for agricultural plants, railway rolling stock inspection/maintenance system, and pulp and paper facilities. Further, it constructs bridges; and provides paper-making equipment. The company was incorporated in 1896 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan. Nippon Sharyo, Ltd. is a subsidiary of Central Japan Railway Company.
